snippet: Attorney General Kathleen Kane’s law license will remain suspended after the State Supreme Court denied her request to have it reinstated while she fights criminal charges.
abstract: Pennsylvania Supreme Court denies Atty Gen Kathleen Kane's request to have her law license reinstated as she fights criminal charges of leaking grand jury proceedings and lying about it.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Kathleen Kane’s law license will remain suspended after the State Supreme Court denied her request to have it reinstated while she fights criminal charges.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Attorney General Loses Bid for License
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Attorney General Loses Bid for License
